The bucketname to connect to

Attributes:

defaultTimeout

numeric defaultTimeout
The default timeout of records sent to Couchbase for storage in minutes. 0 means persist forever.

Attributes:
default - 0

serializable - true

boolean ignoreTimeouts

Attributes:

Attributes:

serializable - true

boolean useClassLoader
